articles.author: Barak Ravid
articles.title: European ministers tell U.S. they'll trigger "snapback" sanctions against Iran - Axios
articles.description: The "snapback" mechanism automatically reimposes all UN Security Council sanctions that were lifted under the 2015 Iran nuclear deal.
articles.content:
• The move is expected to increase the economic pressure on Iran and likely lead to an Iranian retaliation.
  • Iranian officials have threatened in the past that triggering the "snapback"… [+1853 chars]
